block.p: LEO--Eileen. On January 21, 2004. Beloved wife of the late John P. Leo, III of the New York Athletic Club. Loving mother of John P. Leo, IV and Patricia T. Leo. A graduate of Mt. Holyoke College who later worked as a secretary at the School of Nursing at Columbia Presbyterian. Mass of Christian burial Tuesday, January 27, 10AM at the Cabrini Chapel, 190th St and Ft. Washington Ave, Washington Hts, NY. Interment to follow at Woodlawn Cemetery.
